description: Describes the snapshot schedule for the specified gateway volume. The snapshot schedule information includes intervals at which snapshots are automatically initiated on the volume. This operation is only supported in the cached volume and stored volume types.

parameters.name: VolumeARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the volume. Use the  ListVolumes operation to return a list of gateway volumes.

nested_items.name: VolumeARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the volume that was specified in the request.

nested_items.name: StartAt
nested_items.description: The hour of the day at which the snapshot schedule begins represented as hh, where hh is the hour (0 to 23). The hour of the day is in the time zone of the gateway.

nested_items.name: RecurrenceInHours
nested_items.description: The number of hours between snapshots.

nested_items.name: Timezone
nested_items.description: A value that indicates the time zone of the gateway.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: A list of up to 50 tags assigned to the snapshot schedule, sorted alphabetically by key name. Each tag is a key-value pair. For a gateway with more than 10 tags assigned, you can view all tags using the ListTagsForResource API operation.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: Tag key. The key can't start with aws:.
